steps.title: Toggle WiFi
steps.instruction: Turn WiFi OFF, wait 10 seconds, then turn it back ON. Try reconnecting to your network.

steps.title: Forget and Reconnect
steps.instruction: In WiFi settings, select your network → Forget Network. Then reconnect by entering the password again.

steps.title: Restart Router
steps.instruction: Unplug your WiFi router, wait 30 seconds, plug it back in. Wait 2 minutes for it to fully restart.

steps.title: Check Network Adapter
steps.instruction: Windows: Device Manager → Network Adapters → Right-click WiFi adapter → Update Driver or Disable/Enable.

steps.title: Move Closer to Router
steps.instruction: WiFi signal weakens with distance and obstacles. Try moving closer to the router to test.
